# useFocusTrap

Adds an effect which creates a focus trap.

## Parameters

| Param        | Type       | Description                                                                          |
| ------------ | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| ref          | `Object`   | React reference to the target element.                                               |
| initialFocus | `string`   | the CSS selector of the element which receives the focus when the trap is activated. |
| onDeactivate | `function` | invoked when the trap is deactivated.                                                |

## Example

```js
import {useRef} from 'react';
import {useFocusTrap} from '@bluecateng/pelagos';

const Example = () => {
	const ref = useRef(null);
	useFocusTrap(ref);
	return <div ref={ref}>...</div>;
};
```
